aa.description: Grants Champion's Watch and Champion's Interception. Champion's Watch is a group spell that increments Champion's Sight whenever a non-fighter is hit by an enemy. Champion's Sight increments to 50. Champion's Interception consumes Champion's Sight and applies damage reduction to non-fighters in the group based on the number of increments of Champion's Sight consumed. This spell can be toggled off early to gain some Champion's Sight increments back. Champion's Interception can be used through most control effects. Higher ranks lower the base reuse time.
